original_text: My children, listen to what your father teaches you. Listen carefully so that you understand what is right.
korean_text: 아들들아 아비의 훈계를 들으며 명철을 얻기에 주의하라

sentences.original_text: listen to what your father teaches you
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아비가 너를 가르치는 것을 들으라

sentences.original_text: so that you understand what is right
